ComicInfo.Title: The Man Who Wasn't; The Dwarf of Horrormoor; The Thieves; The Invaders!; Half-Human!
ComicInfo.Summary:
When a scientist invents life in a test tube he is erased from existence by God.
A duke plays a trick on his dwarf jester by replacing all of the furniture in his room with smaller versions so as to make the dwarf appear normal size when he wakes.
When Earth is warned that the aliens heading for them are thieves they have no idea that their intent is to steal the sun.
The manufacturer of androids unknowingly marries one and only finds out when he deploys gas to dissolve a group of rebellious androids that plot to depose humanity.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mort Lawrence,Sid Greene,Matt Fox,Bill Benulis,Robert Q. Sale
ComicInfo.Inker: Mort Lawrence,Sid Greene,Matt Fox,Jack Abel,Robert Q. Sale
